data.name: Colorful Party Wars - Original Character Making
data.detailed_description:
This is an additional content that allows you to create your own original character in Colorful Party Wars.

The created character can be created with 4 types, random ability values, and free appearance, and
The characters can be created with four types, random ability values, and any appearance you wish, and will appear in the game as allies or enemies.

The characters you create can be shared with others by sharing the file.
